tool_description: Retrieve multiple downloadable torrent links by searching for keywords related to movies, TV shows, and music titles, with a rating of 10 indicating the highest quality. Download through uTorrent, BitTorrent, and various other clients.
name: Movie, TV, music search and download
title: Movie, TV, music search and download
tool_name: Movie, TV, music search and download

api_list.name: Search Torrents
api_list.description: Get downloadable  torrent link by movie name.

api_list.name: Get Monthly Top 100 Music Torrents
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movie-tv-music-search-and-download.p.rapidapi.com/monthly_top100_music"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie-tv-music-search-and-download.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
